DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate safety tolerability inhale dos GSK233705 new formulation .
DOC.brief_title: A Single Centre Randomized Study Evaluating The Safety And Tolerability Of GSK233705 In Healthy Volunteers .
DOC.detailed_description: A single-centre , randomize , double-blind placebo-controlled , dose-ascending , cross-over study evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacodynamics pharmacokinetics single inhaled dos GSK233705 ( 50 , 100 200Âµg ) , formulate excipient magnesium stearate , healthy volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject 1855 year old NonSmokers Any subject breathing problem . High blood pressure heart abnormality . Any subject currently take prescription nonprescription medication .
